languages.text:
The next {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} against every creature in combat (both allies and enemies) will be an automatic {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Следующее {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} в каждого участника боя (как союзника, так и противника) автоматически станет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.
При использовании этой {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} всегда появляются {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}.

languages.text:
下次{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}新的目标时，必定会造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。此效果对战斗中的所有生物都会生效，不分敌我。
此{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}必定会触发来自{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。

languages.text:
El próximo {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} contra todas las criaturas en el combate (aliadas y enemigas) será un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} automático.
Este {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} siempre provoca {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.

languages.text:
戦闘中の(敵味方を問わず)すべてのクリーチャーに対する次の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}は自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}となる。
この{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}を引き起こす。

languages.text:
Der nächste {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} gegen eine beliebige Kreatur im Kampf (Verbündete und Feinde) wird automatisch ein {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Treffer{/g}.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} löst immer {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} aus.

languages.text:
Le prochain {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} infligé à chaque créature (qu'elle soit alliée ou ennemie) au combat sera automatiquement un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.
Ce {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} déclenche toujours des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.

languages.text:
Çatışmadaki (ister dost ister düşman olsun) herhangi bir yaratığa yapılan bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g}, otomatik olarak {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} dönüşür.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerini{/g} tetikler.
